casebody.data:
NEWBERNE
v.
CRIME CONTROL, et al. No. 75A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 28, 2005. J. Heydt Philbeck, Raleigh, for Reginald Newberne. Donald K. Phillips, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Crime Control, et al. Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, for Asso. of County Commissioners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed until April 13, 2005. Defendant (Department of Crime Control, et al) shall have up to and including the 13th day of April 2005 to file and serve his/her *140brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of March 2005."
